nodes.text: Maddor Rist was a Human male who served as Lord of House Rist during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. In 3643 BBY he hired a bounty hunter to assassinate Zacar Girard of the House Girard.
Maddor Rist is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Nolan North.
